children.name: Aroma
children.description: Aroma testing is a sensory exploration designed to identify and classify the different odors perceived in a sample, such as food, beverages or fragrances. This analysis focuses on recognizing top notes, subcategories and specific attributes that make up the aroma profile, helping to improve sensory appreciation and product characterization.

children.name: Green
children.description: A fresh and grassy aroma with hints of sweetness.

children.name: Wakaba
children.description: A delicate and refreshing scent reminiscent of young leaves.

children.name: Green grass
children.description: A vibrant and earthy aroma similar to freshly cut grass.

children.name: Kinisaya
children.description: A mild and soothing fragrance with subtle vegetal notes.

children.name: Tomato
children.description: A unique and savory scent with a hint of sweetness, reminiscent of ripe tomatoes.

children.name: Live trees - Forest
children.description: A rich and woody aroma that evokes the essence of a lush forest.

children.name: Dry
children.description: A crisp and arid scent that evokes the essence of dry leaves and parched earth.

children.name: Kashiwa mochi
children.description: A sweet and earthy aroma reminiscent of oak leaves and rice cakes.

children.name: Kusamachi
children.description: A fresh and herbal scent with notes of wild grasses and meadow flowers.

children.name: Straw
children.description: A dry and rustic fragrance that evokes the essence of sun-dried straw.

children.name: Kraft paper
children.description: A warm and woody aroma similar to natural, unbleached paper.

children.name: Wood Spoon
children.description: A subtle and comforting scent with hints of polished wood and craftsmanship.

children.name: Vegetable
children.description: A collection of fresh and savory aromas reminiscent of various vegetables.

children.name: Spinach
children.description: A fresh and slightly bitter aroma similar to leafy greens.

children.name: Edamame
children.description: A mild and nutty scent reminiscent of young soybeans.

children.name: Fukashiimo
children.description: A sweet and earthy aroma similar to steamed sweet potatoes.

children.name: Corn
children.description: A sweet and buttery fragrance that evokes the essence of fresh corn.

children.name: Boiled vegetables
children.description: A warm and comforting scent reminiscent of various boiled vegetables.

children.name: Marine
children.description: A collection of fresh and briny aromas reminiscent of the sea.

children.name: Seaweed
children.description: A salty and oceanic scent similar to fresh seaweed.

children.name: Kelp
children.description: A rich and briny aroma reminiscent of underwater kelp forests.

children.name: Wakame
children.description: A mild and slightly sweet scent similar to edible seaweed.

children.name: Fish - Fish Dried
children.description: A savory and umami-rich aroma similar to dried fish.

children.name: Flowery
children.description: A collection of delicate and fragrant floral aromas.

children.name: Lily
children.description: A sweet and intoxicating scent similar to blooming lilies.

children.name: Mitsu
children.description: A light and honeyed aroma reminiscent of nectar.

children.name: Jasmine
children.description: A rich and exotic fragrance similar to jasmine flowers.

children.name: Cherry Blossom - Sakura
children.description: A delicate and sweet scent reminiscent of cherry blossoms.

children.name: Fruity
children.description: A collection of vibrant and sweet fruit aromas.

children.name: Ripe
children.description: A rich and juicy aroma similar to ripe fruits.

children.name: Peach
children.description: A sweet and succulent scent reminiscent of fresh peaches.

children.name: Lychee
children.description: A sweet and floral aroma similar to lychee fruit.

children.name: Orange
children.description: A bright and citrusy fragrance reminiscent of fresh oranges.

children.name: Melon
children.description: A sweet and refreshing scent similar to ripe melons.

children.name: Plum
children.description: A sweet and tangy aroma reminiscent of ripe plums.

children.name: Yuzu
children.description: A zesty and citrusy fragrance similar to yuzu fruit.

children.name: Spicy
children.description: A collection of warm and aromatic spice scents.

children.name: Vanilla
children.description: A sweet and creamy aroma similar to vanilla beans.

children.name: Cinnamon
children.description: A warm and spicy scent reminiscent of cinnamon sticks.

children.name: Sakura mochi
children.description: A sweet and floral aroma similar to cherry blossom rice cakes.

children.name: Roasted
children.description: A collection of rich and toasty aromas.

children.name: Dashi
children.description: A savory and umami-rich scent similar to Japanese soup stock.

children.name: Soy sauce
children.description: A salty and savory aroma reminiscent of soy sauce.

children.name: Burnt
children.description: A smoky and charred fragrance similar to burnt food.

children.name: Kinako
children.description: A nutty and roasted aroma similar to toasted soybean flour.

children.name: Sweet
children.description: A collection of sugary and dessert-like aromas.

children.name: Brown sugar
children.description: A rich and caramel-like scent similar to brown sugar.

children.name: Candy-Tortuose
children.description: A sweet and fruity aroma reminiscent of hard candies.

children.name: Honey
children.description: A sweet and floral fragrance similar to fresh honey.

children.name: Yogourt
children.description: A tangy and creamy scent reminiscent of yogurt.

children.name: Burnt
children.description: A collection of smoky and charred aromas.

children.name: Bare tree
children.description: A woody and earthy scent similar to bare tree branches.

children.name: Kero sene
children.description: A strong and pungent aroma reminiscent of kerosene.

children.name: Tabacco
children.description: A rich and smoky scent similar to tobacco leaves.

children.name: Cacao
children.description: A deep and chocolatey aroma reminiscent of cacao beans.

children.name: Coffee
children.description: A rich and roasted fragrance similar to freshly brewed coffee.

children.name: Taste
children.description: Taste testing is a sensory evaluation focused on identifying and classifying the flavors present in a sample, such as food or beverages. During this test, characteristics such as sweetness, acidity, bitterness, saltiness and umami are analyzed, as well as their combinations and persistence on the palate, with the objective of understanding and describing the taste profile of the product.

children.name: Basic
children.description: The basic taste evaluation focuses on identifying the five fundamental tastes: sweet, salty, sour, bitter and umami. This test analyzes the intensity, balance and presence of these flavors in the sample, providing key information about their taste profile and their impact on the palate.

children.name: Sourness
children.description: Sour taste is related to foods such as lemon, vinegar or yogurt. It is perceived when acids, such as citric acid or acetic acid, are present.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Saltiness
children.description: This flavor is perceived when salts are present, mainly sodium chloride (table salt). It is essential to improve the overall flavor of food.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Sweetness
children.description: Sweetness is perceived when sugars or sweeteners are present. It is a pleasant taste that is usually associated with desserts and comfort foods.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Bitterness
children.description: This flavor is related to compounds such as caffeine or tannins. Although sometimes considered unpleasant, it is appreciated in foods such as coffee and bitter chocolate.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Umami
children.description: This flavor, known as “savory” or “delicious”, is associated with foods rich in monosodium glutamate or free amino acids. It is common in protein or fermented foods.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Mouthfeel
children.description: Mouthfeel evaluation analyzes the physical properties of the sample, such as texture, viscosity, astringency, creaminess, and effervescence. This analysis complements the perception of flavor by considering how the product feels on the palate, which influences the overall sensory experience.
